item.title: 【UPSCALED】John Williams & Vienna Philharmonic - Theme from Jurassic Park [4K AI Upscale HEVC 10-bit / TrueHD Dolby Atmos / DTS-HD MA 5.1]
item.description:
Genre: Classical, Stage & Screen
Style: Soundtrack, Neo-Romantic, Score
Year: 1993 (this recording: 2020)

"Theme from Jurassic Park" is is part of the film score to the 1993 Steven Spielberg film Jurassic Park, composed by American composer, conductor, and pianist John Williams. The score received critical acclaim and is often considered to be one of the most iconic and beloved scores of Williams' career. The main theme of Jurassic Park is widely regarded as one of John Williams' greatest themes.

"Without John Williams, bikes don't really fly, nor do brooms in Quidditch matches, nor do men in red capes,There is no force, dinosaurs do not walk the Earth, we do not wonder, we do not weep, we do not believe." - Steven Spielberg

This music video is muxed from the blu-ray release of "John Williams In Vienna", the live recordings of the Hollywood legend's Vienna Philharmonic 2020 debut. Saying it's "one of the greatest honors of my life," he received a standing ovation before a single note was played. Sharing the stage with the famous orchestra and violinist Anne-Sophie Mutter, he performs iconic themes from Star Wars, Harry Potter, Indiana Jones, Jurassic Park and other cinematic landmarks that have earned countless awards: 5 Oscars, 5 Emmys, 25 Grammys & more.

Release Info
The video track is upscaled to 4K with Topaz Video AI and converted to HEVC 10-bit.
Audio track #1: TrueHD Dolby Atmos / 24-bit 48 kHz
Audio track #2: DTS-HD MA 5.1 / 24-bit 48 kHz
Audio track #3: DTS-HD MA 2.0 / 24-bit 96 kHz
